service.stream_choose_stream: Select a participant's video to share.
service.stream_background:
The worker's Remote APP is
running in background.
service.stream_stoped: The participant's livestreaming is on hold.
service.stream_choice:
Select a video from
the participant's list.
service.stream_choice_share: Would you like to share the selected video with all the participants?
service.stream_choice_share_description: If shared, the pointing feature is unavailable to use.
service.toast_leave_leader: The leader has ended the Collabo.
service.toast_exit_ar: Would you like to end the AR sharing?
service.toast_exit_drawing: Would you like to end the Collaboard?
service.toast_cannot_leave_ar: Cannot move to a different menu during AR sharing.
service.toast_cannot_invite_ar: The AR sharing is not activated.
service.toast_refused_ar: The other person has refused the AR feature, you need to connect again to use the AR feature.
service.toast_unsupport_ar: This device does not support AR feature.
service.toast_request_permission: Requested AR feature to the other person, please wait.
service.toast_ar_exit: The leader has ended the AR sharing.
service.toast_video_restrict_mode:
This is the video restriction mode.
Participants all connect with the camera turned off.​
service.participant_kick_confirm:
Would you like to remove
{name} from the Collabo?
service.participant_ar_cannot_change: Cannot change video during AR sharing.
service.participant_ar_change_alarm:
The AR tasks performed are deleted 
if you start AR sharing with the selected participant.
service.participant_sharing:
Would you like to share selected video with every participants? 
The pointing feature cannot be used during sharing.
service.participant_sharing_cannot_change: Cannot select other video while in sharing mode.
service.participant_no_stream: Cannot share video with this participant.
service.invite_max: Exceeded the number of selectable members.
service.invite_unconnected_list: List of members not connected for Collabo
service.invite_unconnected_remove:
This is a list of members waiting to participate after making a Collabo request.
Use profile remove button to remove waiting list of members.
service.file_type: This upload file format is not supported.
service.share_delete_confirm: Would you like to delete selected image?
service.share_save: Would you like to save the created image?
service.share_delete_real: Are you sure you want to delete it?
service.share_locked: The encrypted file is not supported.
service.drawing_dblclick:
The sharing begins
if you double click the file.
service.drawing_drag:
Drag and drop PDF or image files here,
or use 'Import' button.
service.drawing_sync: Resetting the work created to sync with newly connected participant.
service.setting_server_record_warning: *You cannot change the settings during server recording.
service.setting_record_time_tooltip:
When you create local recording files for a long time, your PC may experience a heavy load.
We recommend you to set recording time intervals.
service.setting_record_resolution_tooltip:
When setting the resolution of 720p (HD) or higher,
please be aware that the service depends on the PC's performance.
service.flash_none: The device does not have a flashlight.
service.flash_no_permission: The other person has refused your request for flashlight access.
service.flash_controlling: The other person is zooming the video.
service.flash_on: The flashlight from other person's device is turned on.
service.flash_off: The flashlight from other person's device is turned off.
service.flash_app_disable: The other person's APP is deactivated. Cannot perform tasks.
service.camera_no_permission: The other person has refused the allow camera access.
service.camera_permission: Requesting the allow device access to the other person.
service.camera_zooming: The other person is zooming the video.
service.camera_app_disable: The other person's APP is deactivated. Cannot perform zooming feature.
service.ar_pointing_max: Place AR 3D arrows on the desired location. You can create up to 30 arrows.
service.ar_area_setting: Setting up the AR area, you can use AR features within the set area.
service.ar_area_success: AR area has been set, you may begin the AR drawing.
service.ar_drawing_max: You can create up to 30 objects.
service.ar_exit_description:
All AR tasks being created will be ended,
would you still wish to quit?
service.chat_stream_background: {name} cannot receive a video since the APP is running in background.
service.chat_drawing: The {name} file is shared on the Collaboard.
service.chat_ar_deny:
You refused the request for AR feature,
you need to connect again to use the AR feature.
service.chat_ar_unsupport: This device does not support AR feature.
service.chat_pointing_allow: The pointing feature is allowed for the participants.
service.chat_pointing_not_allow: The pointing feature is canceled for the participants.
service.chat_record_allow: The local recording is allowed for the participants.
service.chat_record_not_allow: The local recording is canceled for the participants.
service.chat_text_exceed: You cannot enter more than 200 characters.​
service.file_upload_maxnum: Only one file per upload is supported currently.
service.file_image_notsupport: Does not support this image format.
service.file_type_notsupport: Does not support this file format.
service.stt_sync_placeholder: Start a voice chat by making a voice recording.
service.stt_sync_error: An error occurred during voice recognition.
service.record_start_message: Starting the local screen recording. If you wish to end it, click the button again or press [ESC] key.
service.record_fail_memory: Stopping the recording due to lack of PC storage. The file being recorded is not saved.
service.record_end_message: Local recording was successful, please check the file from the recording file menu.
service.record_end_no_stream_message: Stopping the local recording since there is no video.
service.record_local_browser_not_allow_screen_sh: This browser does not allow screen sharing.
service.record_local_browser_not_allow_local_rec: This browser does not support local recording.
service.record_server_start_failed: Server recording could not be started. please try again.​
service.record_server_over_max_count: The server has reached the maximum number of videos to record simultaneously. Please try again later.
service.record_server_no_storage: There is not enough space on the server to store the recorded file. Please contact the administrator.
service.reconnect_disconnected:
The connection has ended due to the network/server issue.
Would you like to reconnect?​
service.map_check_use_gps_description: 요청한 참가자에게 GPS 기능 사용여부를 확인해 주세요.
service.map_cannot_use_gps: This device does not support the location information function.
